### Deployment of Smart Collectors

```{r}

Places <- 
   tribble(~Place, ~Lat, ~Long, ~Type,
           "Green Fablab", 48.69354778372888, 6.199223427009557, "Education",
           "ENSGSI", 48.69508092375094, 6.194086052304349, "Education",
           "ENSGM",  48.695897093034866, 6.193120953312192, "Education",
           "MJC Bazin", 48.69739157499988, 6.194576095053032, "Association",
           "SNN", 48.693487765703644, 6.2016121881502375, "Sport club",
           "Curves", 48.69812957589187, 6.2005961050660385, "Sport club",
           "VNF", 48.69199572042067, 6.1951544736381745, "Enterprise",
           "MAIF", 48.693154051864724, 6.196146452736703, "Enterprise"
   )

my_icons<- awesomeIcons(
  icon = 'h-square',
  iconColor = '#ffffff',
  library = 'fa',
  markerColor = 'red'
                      )



leaflet() %>%
   addTiles() %>%
   setView(lat = Places$Lat[1], lng = Places$Long[1], zoom = 20) %>%  
   addMarkers(lat = Places$Lat, lng = Places$Long)
```
